Contents: Required hacking gauge are different depend on Piece's type
When gauge is full\, press [Q] to heist body
Press [Right Mouse] to use 'Piece's' unique ability
You can check remaining amount of ability gauge
You can use dash by press [Shift]
You can check remaining amount of dash gauge
Security Camera will alarm your current body to other 'Pieces' nearby
You can hack 'Rook' after destroy it's shield
By hitting the Shimmering Pads with Shuriken you can hack the pads the way you need
